name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
October 13, Northwest University of Political Science and Law.
Because the library’s collection of books was insufficient, which affected the doctoral application, the school held a meeting to call on students to donate books.
The class committee asked everyone to donate 1-2 books, or collectively purchase second-hand books on Xianyu and share the cost.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of October 13, an attempted murder occurred at Huizhou City Vocational College.
It is said that a student in Juyuan B District was found to be carrying a knife that night. After that, the student lost control of his emotions and said that he wanted to kill his roommate, and was then controlled.
But because it was too sudden, the process was not captured, only the video of the police taking him away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I stole myself
On October 11, a document from Guangzhou University of Science and Technology showed that a student went to the security office without permission to take his electric bike, and was identified by the school as suspected of stealing an electric bike and was given a serious warning.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Dade Road in Guangzhou has always been a place where unemployed workers sleep.
On October 13, the government sent people to install a bunch of guardrails on the steps to prevent them from sleeping here.
Late at night, people gathered at the door of the bank, not knowing how to spend the night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/uAOnpUwKew

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In July this year, there was news that the street office installed sprinkler equipment to drive away homeless people on Dade Road. It is reported that Dade Road has been a sleeping place for homeless people and unemployed people for more than ten years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Media reports that Chinese tourists are stranded in Israel. Netizens commented: Don't come back, you are not welcome.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of October 13, Eason Chan held a concert in Macau. Some audience members shouted at him to speak Mandarin, to which Eason Chan politely replied: "If you don't understand, forget it."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 10, in Sanlitun, Beijing, a man was holding a white paper with a red flag in his trouser pocket.
The security personnel at the scene immediately called the police but did not stop him. The follow-up is unknown.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 14, Duoyi Network published articles on multiple platforms, openly questioning the unfair law enforcement of the Guangzhou Public Security Bureau.

Netizens’ contributions
Some netizens living near the China-North Korea border shared stories of North Korean defectors they knew.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today, a parent of a primary school in Chongqing was kicked out of the parent group by the teacher because he did not participate in a 5-day study tour costing 1,200 yuan.
The local government responded that it had ordered the school and the teacher to apologize.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At around 9 am on October 14, a student jumped from a building at Inner Mongolia University.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 14, the Israeli Embassy in China issued a statement expressing disappointment that China’s statements and media reports on events in southern Israel did not clearly and unequivocally condemn Hamas’ terrorist attacks and massacres.
The statements issued by China are inconsistent with and untrue to the tragedy that has occurred in the past few days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: There is news that all self-media on the Internet within the Great Firewall will implement a front-end real-name system.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On October 14, the media revealed that the listed company Su Dawei was fined 2.5 million yuan for misleading shareholders by riding on the popularity of "lithography machines".
It is reported that the company had previously "revealed" that their "lithography machines have been sold to leading domestic chip companies" and exported to Japan, South Korea and Israel. This caused shareholders to go completely crazy, and the stock price rose by 20% on the same day, with a transaction amount of up to 1.5 billion yuan.
After that, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange issued a letter of concern, requiring the company to disclose the specific types of lithography equipment produced, major customers and downstream uses.
On October 8, Su Dawei responded that they were selling "laser direct writing lithography machines". The main function is to carve iron sheets.
At present, Su Dawei has been punished with disciplinary sanctions. The China Securities Regulatory Commission has also decided to investigate it. The stock price also plummeted.
